urls.title: Environment Act passed to crack down on water and air pollution - future Net Zero

text: A lot of the farming in Somerset is just dreadful.  My photo below shows how bad it can be. Pasture ploughed up bringing the clay to the top. I believe the contents of that stinking manure heap close by were put on this field and another one nearby. Oaks crown lifted, See thread https://t.co/w5c4VJ7x95 https://t.co/RJH0IKkCP2
